name: DannyLux
description: '''Daniel Balderrama Espinoza''' (born March 12, 2004) better known by his stage name '''DannyLux''', is an American singer-songwriter. He is well known for his hit song with [[Eslabón Armado]] called "[[Jugaste y Sufrí]]" which introduced him to the music industry, becoming one of the biggest new names in the [[regional Mexican]] genre.
